description: Product Description Kaps Delicate Cream Lend an immediate buffed finish to your shoes As our shoes are part of our everyday life, it is important to clean them regularly to enjoy your shoes for many years to come. Kaps Delicate Cream is the perfect conditioner for genuine and faux leather shoes. suitable for faux and genuine leather cleans and nourishes and restores colour to revive from natural beeswax (water-repellent) choose from a variety of colours (Content: 50 ml) and it is made in EU How to use Ensure the leather is clean. Remove any dirt and wipe with a damp cloth if necessary. Apply a small amount of Kaps Delicate Cream using the sponge applicator. Once the cream is dry buff the leather. Made in EU Water-Repellent From Natural Beeswax For Smooth and Faux Leather Delicate Cream The video showcases the product in use. The video guides you through product setup. The video compares multiple products. The video shows the product being unpacked. Video Player is loading. Do I need a special cloth or is a cloth included with the product? The product does not come with a cloth. Use can use any shoe polish cloth. Can I use the product to re-dye material? No, Delicate Cream is designed to restore colour. What is the jar's size? The glass jar holds 50 ml of Delicate Cream.
